did.unittitle: Male, unidentified, sitting in a suit at a desk. Back of the photograph reads: To Mr. and Mrs. E.D. McGuire, the picture on the reverse is the picture of the vandidate you helped to elect together with the chair to which he was elected. He sends you this picture merely to manifest in a small way his great love for you both not because of this but because you are just Boone and Stella. Your Brother, Bun
